table.name: (Select t_imsstudent.XM as stuname,t_imsgroupLink.stuno as studentID,t_imstraindevice.code as code,t_imscoursegroup.name as name,t_imstraindevice.device as device, t_imscoursegroup.Mainteacher as teacher,t_imstraindevice.traindate as traindate,t_imstraindevice.starttraindate as starttraindate, t_imstraindevice.endtraindate as endtraindate from t_imstraindevice join t_imscoursegroup on t_imstraindevice.CourseGroupCode = t_imscoursegroup.code join t_imsgroup on t_imstraindevice.code=t_imsgroup.CourseCode join t_imsgroupLink on t_imsgroup.OBJ_ID = t_imsgroupLink.groupID join t_imsstudent on t_imsgroupLink.stuno=t_imsstudent.XH) AS t_imsapply
